string.text:
Externally, the Heavy armour resembles an exoskeleton, but the first and main difference that is striking is the lack of a helmet and servo drives on the arms and legs, as well as a battery behind the back. Due to this difference, the Heavy suit is lighter than an exoskeleton and also allows its owner to run. Despite its popularity, the costume has not found its name.

Externally, the Heavy armour resembles an exoskeleton, but the first and main difference that is striking is the lack of servo drives on the arms and legs, as well as a battery behind the back. Made by the masters of the Sultan gang at his request, instead of expensive exoskeletons, due to this difference, Heavy armor suit is lighter than an exoskeleton, and also allows its owner to run. In all other parameters, the suit is identical to an exoskeleton, except that it has a little less protection from bullets and shrapnel explosions and provides the carrier with less protection from shocks. Despite its popularity, the costume has not found its name.

The early Duty model, suit is a flak jacket of special forces of PS3-9 series, adapted for use in the conditions of the Zone. Externally, the Heavy armor suit resembles an exoskeleton, but the first and main difference that is striking is the absence of a helmet and servo drives on the hands and feet, as well as a battery behind the back. Due to this difference, the Heavy suit is lighter than an exoskeleton and also allows its owner to run. Despite its popularity, the costume has not found its name.

%c[0,170,170,170]FEATURES:
%c[ui_lime] • %c[default] Increased carrying capacity

Externally, the Heavy armour resembles an exoskeleton, but the first and main difference that is striking is the lack of a helmet and servo drives on the arms and legs, as well as a battery behind the back. Due to this difference, the Heavy suit is lighter than an exoskeleton and also allows its owner to run. Despite its popularity, the costume has not found its name.

%c[0,170,170,170]FEATURES:
%c[ui_lime] • %c[default] additional mounting points for modules

A modified PS5 Berilllium-plated body armor for the Zone, which has been improved by the Dolga craftsmen. The vest is designed for assault operations in areas with high radiation background, but is ineffective in conditions of high anomalous activity. Stalkers are reached through the military, who change the army's property to a hut. It is equipped with fasteners for additional modules.

%c[0,170,170,170]KEY FEATURES:
%c[ui_lime] • %c[default] Increased carrying capacity and protection from bullets, tearing and explosions

Standard Dawn suit with M2 servo drives. In general, the protection is the same as that of a normal Zarya, but the weight to be carried is significantly increased. Compared to a conventional proto-exoskeleton, it has a higher weight, but also a higher payload and increased radiation protection. It is also much easier to run in.

Reinforced modification of the M2 modification servo-driven protective scientific suit. Manufactured specifically for the Zone's field operations, but the carrying weight and capacity have been significantly increased. Compared to the standard proto-exoskeleton, it has lower weight, higher payload, and increased protection against radiation. It also makes running much easier.

The outfit combines a two-layer rubberized fabric with a plexiglass lining and an integrated flak jacket, as well as an additional unloading. Despite the fact that the body armor penetrates even with a pistol bullet, the suit is very popular because of its low cost and wide range of possibilities for improvement. Equipped with built-in fasteners for additional modules. Modified by bandit masters.

Military armour isolating suit "Gagarin" designed for assault operations in extreme conditions of the Zone. It is equipped with an external insulating coating and a closed-loop breathing system, the main element of which is a modification of gas mask GP-17. Thanks to this solution it perfectly protects against abnormal influences. The basis of armor protection is a modification of vests series Fort Redut T7, which provides excellent protection against shell bullets and fragments, while not reducing the mobility of the owner. Despite the excellent protective properties in terms of stalkers has the following drawbacks: low carrying weight. It has 3 slots for additional modules.

A simple piece of fabric wrapped mask. It is often used by Stalkers to prevent dangerous particles from entering the body, as a precautionary measure. It is recommended to wear it even if the Geiger counter is not signaled, as air can be contaminated to some extent. However, it can also accumulate toxins over a longer period of time, so it is always advisable to have a spare one for quick replacement.
